How much I can get for my monster? (Market Pricing)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How much I can get for my monster? (Market Pricing)
By Corpse13 on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 01:17 pm:

Just thought of a rather odd question.
Sometimes, when one of my save files
becomes full, and none of the monsters on it
combine well, I generally sell the ones that
don't combine good to the Market for extra $$$.
My question is, what factors determine how
much you get, and why. I don't have the tools
neccesary to hack into it and find out, but if
anyone knows, I'd love to know.

By AlphaFAT2 on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 01:59 pm:

From what I can tell this is what factors in. However I am not positive.

Age
Rank
Loyalty
Rarity *This is a long speculation*

By mepersoner on Tuesday, April 24, 2001 - 03:49 pm:

Ya my near maxed out hengers that had beaten Legend cup were only worth 1600, but Jokers_Avenger's jokers that had maybe beaten S class, if that, they may not have been strong enough, were worth a nice 9800.

By Corpse13 on Wednesday, April 25, 2001 - 10:26 am:

The most I've seen myself was $6400 for one of my many champion Cinder Birds. I'm hoping for the day that I can squeak out $10,000+ for something.

By jello on Saturday, April 28, 2001 - 07:50 pm:

Dude, my HOF Phoenix with two stats maxxed
and a total of four thousand, six years old and
hes only worth $600.
